title: Geoff Keighley Announces Summer Game Fest - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.01.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Geoff Keighley's Summer Game Fest and what it means for E3. 

Time Stamps -  
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:02:54 - Geoff Keighley announces Summer Game Fest
00:29:05 - Do you think Sony/XBox will partner with SGF to reveal the PS5 or will the do it on their own stage? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:34:55 - Do you see this event replacing E3 in future years? - Best Friends Q:billythedoor
00:37:30 - Phil Spencer says there’s No Delay Expected for Xbox Series X - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:42:40 - GDC Summer Is Going Fully Digital - Blog post
00:48:20 - Out today
00:50:40 -  Old Spice
 Reader mail   -
00:52:02 - Should Playstation listen to subscribers and change the games before the end of the month or should they stick to their guns and probably follow the agreement with both of these game publishers/ developers? - RobbyRob
00:58:50 - Squad Up:Jackson(PS4) - wutz_hiz_nutz PS4
00:59:37 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Blessing and Greg
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Gary
THURSDAY: Greg and Blessing
FRIDAY: Blessing and Greg 
 - Post Show
